experience.title: Initiative founder and execution lead
experience.description: 1. Plasma donation - Built a plasma donor database and connected donors to patients ensuring donor privacy and end-to-end process support- Started with connecting relatives, became an initiative across 20 Indian cities - Scaled the volunteering team to around 120 volunteers and partnered with the social body of IIT Bombay for dedicated volunteering effort2. Food donation - effected 300 food packets to be donated daily at hospitals in Bhopal for the duration of 2nd wave lockdowns.This was all possible due to dedicated participation of umpteen friends, family and strangers coming together to contribute and help
